msIdentifier.repository: Stofnun Árna Magnússonar í íslenskum fræðum, Reykjavík

msItem.title: Hrings saga og Tryggva (Extracts)
msItem.incipit: Hringr hellt nu heim til Saxlands
msItem.explicit: ok bæti her til mariu uersi.

filiation.p: Copied from AM 489 4to and AM 586 4to (cf. note on fol. 1r)

msItem.title: Sigrgarðs saga frækna (Extracts)
msItem.incipit: þu mik at spyria segir hun
msItem.finalRubric: ok luku uer þar sogu sigurgardz

filiation.p: Copied from AM 556 a 4to (cf. note on fol. 3r)

msItem.title: Grega saga (Extracts)
msItem.incipit: ok þui skal sia mær
msItem.explicit: ok ættadi ser[?] at kueikia jotuninn

filiation.p: Copied from AM 567 XXVI 4to (cf. note on fol. 17r)

msItem.title: Hrólfs saga Gautrekssonar (Extracts)
msItem.incipit: truþi betr enn ollum odr
msItem.explicit: brot af sviþiod
msItem.incipit: th[?] gørdi þa ord katir
msItem.explicit: skiolld hefur þad sva mikinn

filiation.p: Copy of two fragments in AM 567 XIV 4to (cf. note on fol. 21r)

msItem.note: Part of chs. 30 (Rafn 1829-30, III:172 ff.) and 31-32 (Rafn 1829-30, III: 175 ff.).

msItem.title: Gautreks saga (Extracts)
msItem.incipit: i þeirra minnum ok nu munu þau tynaz
msItem.explicit: ok vissi eingi hvat af honum vard
msItem.incipit: kuað talin smærri þyngsl
msItem.explicit: ok einn dag er Rennir bondi geck

filiation.p: Copy of two fragments in AM 567 XIV 4to (cf. note on fol. 25r)

msItem.note: Text from chs. 1-2 (Rafn 1829-30, III: 8-10) and ch. 2 (Rafn 1829-30, III: 12 ff.).

msItem.title: Kirjalax saga
msItem.incipit: saungua. Nu koma þeir i hollina
msItem.explicit: Ector hinn orti kappi allr heims hann saa[?] leiðe

filiation.p: Copy of fragment in AM 567 XV 4to (cf. note on fol. 29r)

msItem.title: Bevers saga
msItem.incipit: hann hugsaði nu hversu hann mundi geta hefnt
msItem.explicit: en let Arundela lausan hlaupa þui at

filiation.p: Copy of fragment in AM 567 VII 4to (cf. note on fol. 31r). The same note suggests it was compared with a copy of the saga in AM 181 c fol.

msItem.title: The Life of St. Christopher
Vita et passio sancti Christophori martyris (Icelandic)
msItem.incipit: Christofor var eirn merkilegur sfór og ásjálegur maður
msItem.explicit: Um hann má lesa framar, lombard, legi gendus cap. 95

filiation.p: Copy from AM 594a 4to (cf. note on fol. 33r)

msItem.title: Description of AM 603 4to
msItem.incipit: Membran i stift træbind. Pergamentet er morkt
msItem.explicit: hvis Digtning ikke hörer til de bedste
msItem.note: Dated 11 Jul (18?)73 on fol. 34r. beside a note reading: Modt Pall Gröndal. Includes partial transcriptions of the contents of AM 603 4to with variants from other manuscripts.

msItem.title: Klerkarímur
msItem.rubric: Klerka-Rimur efter AM. no. 603, 4to med Varianter af No. 604 H 8vo
msItem.incipit: Jafnan kunna skalden skyr
msItem.explicit: j höndt denne kunde vorn[?] noget yngre.

filiation.p: Copy from text in AM 603 4to with variants from AM 604 h 4to (not 8vo as stated on fol. 56r).

msItem.note: Text written as verse and as prose on facing pages. Accompanied by commentary on the rímur beginning on fol. 74.

msItem.title: Péturs drápa postula
msItem.incipit: 1. Orð sat vpphafs giörðir
msItem.explicit: vid borg þessi sidan

filiation.p: Copy from AM 621 4to (cf. note on fol. 80r)

msItem.title: Nikulás saga (Extracts)
msItem.incipit: hverr megi orðum skýra þá sæmd
msItem.explicit: heimsækjandi greinda guðs höll

filiation.p: Excerpted from AM 640 4to (cf. note on fol. 88r)

msItem.title: Nikulás saga (Extracts)
msItem.incipit: hverr megi orðum skýra þá sæmd
msItem.explicit: fram rennandi[?] af steinþrósels Nicholai

filiation.p: Excerpted from AM 643 4to (cf. note on fol. 90r)

msItem.title: Nikulás saga (Extracts)
msItem.incipit: Þessi maðr var stórliga ríkr svá sem kaupmaðr
msItem.explicit: síðan varð bæði postoli ok guðspjollom aðr

filiation.p: Excerpted from AM 643 4to (cf. note on fol. 92r)

msItem.title: Jóns saga postula (Extracts)
msItem.incipit: Allri heimskringlu, er fyrir fent[?] ok heilaga trú lifir
msItem.explicit: ljósi biartara i þessum miraculis

filiation.p: Excerpted from AM 649 a 4to (cf. note on fol. 94r)

msItem.title: Jóns saga postula (Extracts)
msItem.incipit: Bróðir Jón Damascenus minnztr í munkalögum
msItem.explicit: ok at dauða son einnz[?] honum engi dáligri

filiation.p: Excerpted from AM 649 a 4to (cf. note on fol. 99r)

msItem.title: Tveggja postula saga Jóns og Jakobs (Extracts)
msItem.incipit: Turpin erkibyskup varð langlifari
msItem.explicit: ok uppreisir smíðar sjálfum sér himinríki
msItem.colophon: Karla Magnús hofði latið smíða reglega kirkju i Compostella, heilogum Iacobi til dýrðar

filiation.p: Excerpted from AM 651 I 4to (cf. note on fol. 101r)

msItem.note: Note at the foot of fol. 101r reads: Þorvaldur Bjarnason

msItem.title: Placidus saga (Extracts)
msItem.incipit: A daugum traiani keisara uar hofdingi riddara sa er Placidus het
msItem.explicit: Sell ertu þui at þu toct[?]

filiation.p: Excerpted from AM 655 X 4to (cf. note on fol. 103r)

msItem.title: Jóns saga postula (Extracts)
msItem.incipit: En er Jóan sá at þeir voro hryggvir
msItem.explicit: oc veit eigi hverium hann sparir til handa þat er hann hirðir með ohyggiu

filiation.p: Excerpted from two fragments of AM 656 4to (cf. note on fol. 107r)

msItem.title: Unidentified æfintýri
msItem.incipit: myklu mest, ok hann drepr einn mikinn hjort ok etr ok fleiri dyrin med honum
msItem.explicit: ok þikker ollum mikils um vert er heyra ok lykr sua þerse soghu

filiation.p: Excerpted from AM 657 b 4to (cf. note on fol. 109r)

msItem.note: Probably one of the æfintýri mentioned in Kålund's entry for AM 657 a-b 4to (Katalog, II:69 ns. 6 and 11)

msItem.title: Unidentified æfintýri
msItem.incipit: lifdu bede[?] ok eru i himinriki þadan foru vid vit til ekkiunnar
msItem.explicit: for sidan einsetu madr heim med fulltingi engilsins ok ende þar lif sitt i godre elli og lykzt sua þetta efentyr

filiation.p: Excerpted from AM 657 b 4to (cf. note on fol. 110r)

msItem.note: Probably one of the æfintýri mentioned in Kålund's entry for AM 657 a-b 4to (Katalog, II:69 ns. 6 and 11)

msItem.title: Unidentified æfintýri
msItem.incipit: Nokkorr akrkarl starfande i daghlegum krankleika
msItem.explicit: þa lifde hun sua semilega at eigi er ef aa at hon man til fedrs sins komit hafa eftir sinn dauda

filiation.p: Excerpted from AM 657 b 4to (cf. note on fol. 111v)

msItem.note: Probably one of the æfintýri mentioned in Kålund's entry for AM 657 a-b 4to (Katalog, II:69 ns. 6 and 11)

msItem.title: Unidentified æfintýri
msItem.incipit: Enn skal segia þessu næst hversu falsligt yfir bragð kann at verda lygilikt
msItem.explicit: tekinn til gudræddr formadr at styra husi drottins er lifir ok rikir vm veralldir verallda

filiation.p: Excerpted from AM 657 b 4to (cf. note on fol. 117r)

msItem.note: Probably one of the æfintýri mentioned in Kålund's entry for AM 657 a-b 4to (Katalog, II:69 ns. 6 and 11)

msItem.title: Unidentified æfintýri
msItem.incipit: En byriar sua æuentyr at agietr madr ok sidvandr aboti styrdi sitt munklofi
msItem.explicit: þat litla lauss blad sem her stendr nærst skrifat at þui framar skim verdleikr karoli med guds kristni

filiation.p: Excerpted from AM 657 b 4to (cf. note on fol. 121r)

msItem.note: Probably one of the æfintýri mentioned in Kålund's entry for AM 657 a-b 4to (Katalog, II:69 ns. 6 and 11)

msItem.title: Unidentified æfintýri
msItem.incipit: Sudr i lumbardi var einn riddari miok audigr ok vel at ser
msItem.explicit: enn jafnan god ord af monnum er af honum er sagt

filiation.p: Excerpted from AM 657 b 4to (cf. note on fol. 125r)

msItem.note: Probably one of the æfintýri mentioned in Kålund's entry for AM 657 a-b 4to (Katalog, II:69 ns. 6 and 11)

msItem.title: Unidentified æfintýri
msItem.incipit: Sva er ritat af hinum goda guds vin remigio erkibiskupi
msItem.explicit: þar sem þerse munkr er nu er fra sagt venti eigi huat gud veitti honum lifanda

filiation.p: Excerpted from AM 657 b 4to (cf. note on fol. 129r)

msItem.note: Probably one of the æfintýri mentioned in Kålund's entry for AM 657 a-b 4to (Katalog, II:69 ns. 6 and 11)

msItem.title: Unidentified æfintýri
msItem.incipit: Einn danskr madr for utanlandz at vitia heilagra stada
msItem.explicit: Rikti ballduine konungr yfir iorsalalandi ok giorduz margir merkilegir lutir undir hans konungdome

filiation.p: Excerpted from AM 657 b 4to (cf. note on fol. 133r)

msItem.note: Probably one of the æfintýri mentioned in Kålund's entry for AM 657 a-b 4to (Katalog, II:69 ns. 6 and 11).

msItem.title: Unidentified æfintýri
msItem.incipit: Rodbert lysti þui fyri sinum kompanum ballduina ok gudifrey
msItem.explicit: Epter bardagann wrdu þeir Rodbert ok ballduin æigi aa eitt aasattir huarum konungs nockurt bar til handa þottiz hvartueggi eigi

filiation.p: Excerpted from AM 657 b 4to (cf. note on fol. 139r)

msItem.note: Probably one of the æfintýri mentioned in Kålund's entry for AM 657 a-b 4to (Katalog, II:69 ns. 6 and 11).

msItem.title: Unidentified æfintýri
msItem.incipit: A ofanverdum dǫgum hins helga olaafs konungs haralldzsonar ox upp einn vngr madr er lanfrancus het
msItem.explicit: Enn nu skal segia þersu nest nǫkkvt af ferdvm rodberts vilhialms sonar er ver gaafum vpp i krossan iorsala landz

filiation.p: Excerpted from AM 657 b 4to (cf. note on fol. 143r)

msItem.note: Probably one of the æfintýri mentioned in Kålund's entry for AM 657 a-b 4to (Katalog, II:69 ns. 6 and 11).

msItem.title: Unidentified æfintýri
msItem.incipit: hardla sæmiligr diakn at vigslu
msItem.explicit: lyktar her at segia fra heinreki keisara

filiation.p: Excerpted from AM 657 b 4to (cf. note on fol. 154r)

msItem.note: Probably one of the æfintýri mentioned in Kålund's entry for AM 657 a-b 4to (Katalog, II:69 ns. 6 and 11).

msItem.title: Unidentified æfintýri
msItem.incipit: Husbondi var einn hardla rikr i borginni alexandria aa egiptalandi
msItem.explicit: fylgir her frasogn er enn styrkir fyrra efni at margr er vandsienn ok leyniz vm stundar sakir vndir betri aasionu enn hann hefir

filiation.p: Excerpted from AM 657 b 4to (cf. note on fol. 156r)

msItem.note: Probably one of the æfintýri mentioned in Kålund's entry for AM 657 a-b 4to (Katalog, II:69 ns. 6 and 11).

msItem.title: Unidentified æfintýri
msItem.incipit: A nokkurum tima fædduz aa lif aa gofgum fedingum godr[?] guds aastum furstus at nafni
msItem.explicit: Takandi at sidarstu kenni

filiation.p: Excerpted from AM 657 b 4to (cf. note on fol. 160r)

msItem.note: Probably one of the æfintýri mentioned in Kålund's entry for AM 657 a-b 4to (Katalog, II:69 ns. 6 and 11).

msItem.title: Unidentified æfintýri
msItem.incipit: Enn atburdr seguzst af einsetumann einum
msItem.explicit: skal ek drepa hana þesr einn hamar undan bellti ser hleypr at

filiation.p: Excerpted from AM 657 b 4to (cf. note on fol. 161r)

msItem.note: Probably one of the æfintýri mentioned in Kålund's entry for AM 657 a-b 4to (Katalog, II:69 ns. 6 and 11).

msItem.title: Unidentified æfintýri
msItem.incipit: Einn voldugr konungr sat í ríki sínu
msItem.explicit: ok endiz þar þessi frásógn

filiation.p: Excerpted from AM 657 b 4to (cf. note on fol. 162r)

msItem.note: Probably one of the æfintýri mentioned in Kålund's entry for AM 657 a-b 4to (Katalog, II:69 ns. 6 and 11).

msItem.title: Thómas saga erkibiskups
msItem.incipit: Enn er þeir settu erchkibiskupsins líkam af golfuinu
msItem.explicit: skakk um þvert andlitið

filiation.p: Copied from AM 662 4to (cf. note on fol. 164r)

msItem.note: Followed by seven lines of notes on terms in the saga.

msItem.title: Description of AM 662b 4to
msItem.incipit: 4. blað; eina blaðið sem heilt er í þessu brota kveri Thómassógu
msItem.explicit: 49. col. 6. i. lína.

msItem.author: Sigurður blindur
msItem.title: Rósa
msItem.incipit: briotar malms af grænum palma
msItem.explicit: æðan[?] ok holld af skelfing mædizt

filiation.p: Copied from AM 713 4to (cf. note on fol. 166bisr)

msItem.title: Syndavísur
msItem.incipit: Maria drottning mild ok skær
msItem.explicit: her skal höndin falla. Amen.

filiation.p: Copied from AM 713 4to (cf. note on fol. 170r)

msItem.title: Maríuvísur
msItem.incipit: Einginn heyrði ok einginn sá
msItem.explicit: ágæt jungfrú Mariá María frú líknar brú minnar sálar minztu nú

filiation.p: Copied from AM 713 4to (cf. note on fol. 174r)

msItem.title: Tómas diktur erkibiskups
msItem.incipit: Hæstur heilagur andi
msItem.explicit: lof sé helgum anda. Amen.

filiation.p: Copied from AM 713 4to (cf. note on fol. 176r)

msItem.title: Maríuvísur
msItem.incipit: Ave agæt maria
msItem.explicit: amen fyri utan enda.

filiation.p: Copied from AM 713 4to (cf. note on fol. 178r)

msItem.title: Maríuvísur
msItem.incipit: Jhesus moðuren jungfu skær
msItem.explicit: en ond min nadir fyndi

filiation.p: Copied from AM 713 4to (cf. note on fol. 180r)

msItem.title: Maríuvísur
msItem.incipit: Heilags anda höllin glæst
msItem.explicit: lifandi drottning mariá.

filiation.p: Copied from AM 713 4to (cf. note on fol. 184r)

msItem.title: Ceciliuvísur
msItem.incipit: Holldzens girnder hrinda mier
msItem.explicit: fyri kongi lyds ok landa amen.

filiation.p: Copied from AM 713 4to (cf. note on fol. 186r)

msItem.title: Maríuvísur
msItem.incipit: Heyr þú enn hæsti hjálpari minn
msItem.explicit: sem dyrðar drottningu stæði. Amen.

filiation.p: Copied from AM 713 4to (cf. note on fol. 188r)

msItem.title: Maríuvísur
msItem.incipit: Heyr mik dýruzt drottins frú
msItem.explicit: benedicta tú blezat sprund

filiation.p: Copied from AM 713 4to (cf. note on fol. 190r)

msItem.note: Two lines from another verse crossed-out at the beginning: Fýrir mik at fremja dikt verri frú tilkeyriligt

msItem.title: Vísur af María Magdalena
msItem.incipit: Vil ek þér vísur vanda
msItem.explicit: ráði þeir sem vilja.

filiation.p: Copied from AM 713 4to (cf. note on fol. 192r)

msItem.title: Maríuvísur
msItem.incipit: Maria vil ek þik móðir guðs
msItem.explicit: lofaður í sælu þína

filiation.p: Copied from AM 713 4to (cf. note on fol. 194r)

msItem.title: Vísur af Maria Magdalena
msItem.incipit: Ágætt óðar efni
msItem.explicit: María fel ek þér enda. Amen.

filiation.p: Copied from AM 713 4to (cf. note on fol. 197bisr)

msItem.title: Drápa af Maríu grát
msItem.incipit: Orðin gef þú mjög til mærðar
msItem.explicit: dreyra þíns er grátinn heyra. Amen.

filiation.p: Copied from AM 713 4to (cf. note on fol. 205r)

msItem.title: Katrínar drápa
msItem.incipit: Drottenn gef þu dyr at ec mætta
msItem.explicit: laufa pollur j læstu brefi mattu at v ollum.

filiation.p: Copied from AM 713 4to (cf. note on fol. 213r)

msItem.title: Maríuvísur
msItem.incipit: gud sinn mundi
msItem.explicit: ok syngi vers Ave María

filiation.p: Copied from AM 720a II 4to (cf. note on fol. 221r)

msItem.title: Meyjarkvæði
msItem.incipit: Um heidurs mey vil ek hefja
msItem.explicit: forstoð þessi fallda lindin fljoðun

filiation.p: Copied from AM 720a II 4to (cf. note on fol. 222r)

msItem.title: Pálsvísur
msItem.incipit: herran fer er hialpin skædi
msItem.explicit: vil ek svo enda visu mina.

filiation.p: Copied from AM 720a VII 4to (cf. note on fol. 223r)

msItem.title: Tómasdiktur
msItem.incipit: A ek ens biarta bloma
msItem.explicit: ok rekin j fjotur ok streing

filiation.p: Copied from AM 720a VII 4to (cf. note on fol. 224r)

msItem.title: Margrétarvísur
msItem.incipit: fegri litu þeir aungvan svanna
msItem.explicit: yoar[?] settur eitt kirit til

filiation.p: Copied from AM 720a II 4to (cf. note on fol. 225r)

msItem.title: Heilagra manna drápa
msItem.incipit: niðr í heila sarit hodda vers með sverða oddum
msItem.explicit: vendu honum þegar freistni kenndi

filiation.p: Copied from AM 720a VI 4to (cf. note on fol. 227r)

msItem.note: Three verses in two distinct hands.

msItem.title: Two verses on St. Nicholas
msItem.incipit: blindir, daufir, barnung jóð
msItem.explicit: syngist með eitt lag og alle (mun)[?] psalite

filiation.p: Copied from AM 640 4to (cf. note on fol. 228r)

msItem.note: Written upside down and in two different hands.

msItem.title: Verse on St. Nicholas
msItem.incipit: Nikulam skulum vér heiðra kér
msItem.explicit: Sjúkra hegrir hljóð harm ef syrgja fljóð
msItem.note: Written upside down. Possibly taken from AM 640 4to?

msItem.title: Maríujarteikn
msItem.incipit: Vinsensius en annar Stephanus Martius
msItem.explicit: þa tueim hondum aa kertinu

filiation.p: Copied from AM 720a VIII 4to (cf. note on fol. 229r)

msItem.title: Maríujarteikn
msItem.explicit: þa tueim hondum aa kertinu

filiation.p: Probably copied from AM 720a VIII 4to.

msItem.note: Leaf formerly pasted over fol. 230.

msItem.title: Eiríks saga víðförla
msItem.incipit: Kongr het þrandr
msItem.explicit: odains akr enn kristner[?]

filiation.p: Probably copied from AM 720a VIII 4to.

msItem.note: Leaf formerly pasted over fol. 230.

msItem.title: Eiríks saga víðförla
msItem.incipit: Kongr het þrandr
msItem.explicit: i himne eru þriar

filiation.p: Copied from AM 720a VIII 4to (cf. note on fol. 231r).

msItem.title: Boðorðavísur
msItem.incipit: Dikt ek ætla um dyr og fríð
msItem.explicit: er fagra dyrð reið heyra ok se

filiation.p: Copied from AM 721 4to with variants from AM 720 (b?) 4to (cf. note on fol. 233r).

msItem.title: Untitled verse
msItem.incipit: Eptirdæmið eitt eg sa
msItem.explicit: þó skeifu efniður skrafi um miskun þína

filiation.p: Copied from AM 148 8vo (cf. note on fol. 239r).

msItem.note: Followed by seven lines of commentary on the word skeifu-efnið attributed to (?) Jón Sigurðarson.

msItem.title: Krosskvæði (Excerpt)
msItem.incipit: Guð himnanna græðarinn manna
msItem.explicit: verðr ei fullskýrð
msItem.note: One verse of Krosskvæði from AM 148 8vo with references to 11 other MSS of the text.

msItem.title: Krosskvæði
msItem.incipit: Hlýði allir ýtar snjallir
msItem.explicit: þrennum ok einum þat lof færa. Amen.

filiation.p: According to a note on fol. 242r, this text was copied from AM 720 4to (actually AM 721 4to?), AM 710 4to (i.e. AM 710 g 4to?) and Add. 72 4to (now shelfmarked AM 1032 4to).

msItem.title: Dorotheu saga (Extracts)
msItem.incipit: Hjálparinn heims ok landa
msItem.explicit: grimmlega kualldi mey.

filiation.p: Copied from AM 429 12mo (cf. note on fol. 249r).

msItem.author: Jón Pálsson Maríuskáld
msItem.title: Maríuvísur
msItem.incipit: Sancta María mater mild
msItem.explicit: utan enda svo standi.

filiation.p: Copied from Johan Perinskiöld's Fragmentum runico-papisticum, printed in 1721 (cf. note on fol. 253v).

msItem.note: Note on fol. 253r reads: Auctor Jón Maríuskáld fadir Finnboga lögmanns

msItem.title: Glossary
msItem.rubric: Ur Jons sogu presta og guðspjallamanz
msItem.incipit: óreign : fátækt (1r
msItem.explicit: upp á meinleysi bróður Jóns
msItem.note: A glossary of terms, mostly Icelandic/Latin, but some Icelandic/Icelandic. Supplemented by 9 fragments containing further glosses (numbered 256a-i)

msItem.title: Table of Contents
msItem.incipit: 1. Afskrift af 677 4to gregorus homilies og dialoges
msItem.explicit: til at tage afskrift af olem[?]
msItem.note: Table of contents for another, unidentified manuscript.

supportDesc.foliation: Later foliation in lower margins of recto leaves.

additions.p: Contains occasional marginal notes and textual emendations.
Autograph on fol. 162r reads: Þoro. Bjarnarson. Another on fol. 164r reads: þorv. Bj.
Leaf containing parts of Maríujarteikn and Eiríks saga víðförla pasted over fol. 230r. Described above as fol. 230a. Fol. 230av blank.

revisionDesc.change: Created as subset of full file on handrit.is.
Introduced repository auth file. Updated repository element pointing, adding @ref and removing @key.
Inserted origDate and origPlace elements based on previous data, now removed.
Extracted pagination and page dimension data from previous version.
Extracted layout data from previous version.
